empty.selectIssue: Select an issue to view details

notConnected.title: GitHub Not Connected
notConnected.description: Configure your GitHub token and repository in project settings to sync issues.

investigation.title: Create Task from Issue
investigation.description: Create a task from this GitHub issue. The task will be added to your Kanban board in the Backlog column.
investigation.taskCreated: Task created! View it in your Kanban board.

settings.enableIssuesDescription: Sync issues from GitHub and create tasks automatically
settings.browserWindow: A browser window should open for you to log in.
settings.issuesAvailableDescription: Access GitHub Issues from the sidebar to view, investigate, and create tasks from issues.
settings.defaultBranchDescription: Base branch for creating task worktrees
settings.branchFromNote: All new tasks will branch from
settings.autoSyncDescription: Automatically fetch issues when the project loads

issueListHeader.title: GitHub Issues
issueListHeader.analyzeAndGroupTooltip: Analyze up to 200 open issues, group similar ones, and review proposed batches before creating tasks.
issueListHeader.autoFixTooltip: Automatically fix new issues as they come in.

integration.title: GitHub Integration
integration.projectSpecificDescription: This GitHub repository is configured only for {{projectName}}. Each project can have its own GitHub repository.
integration.enableIssuesDescription: Sync issues from GitHub and create tasks automatically
integration.tokenInstructions: Create a token with {{scope}} scope from
integration.issuesAvailableDescription: Access GitHub Issues from the sidebar to view, investigate, and create tasks from issues.
integration.autoSyncOnLoadDescription: Automatically fetch issues when the project loads

oauth.cliRequiredDescription: The GitHub CLI (gh) is required for OAuth authentication. This provides a secure way to authenticate without manually creating tokens.
oauth.connectDescription: Click the button below to authenticate with GitHub. This will open your browser where you can authorize the application.
oauth.waitingForAuth: Waiting for authentication flow to start...
oauth.completeAuthInBrowser: Please complete the authentication in your browser. This window will update automatically.
oauth.enterCodeInBrowser: Enter this code in your browser to complete authentication.
oauth.copyCodeThenOpenLink: Copy this code, then open the link below to authenticate.
oauth.accountNowConnected: Your GitHub account is now connected
oauth.authenticationTimeoutMessage: Authentication timed out. The authentication window was open for too long. Please try again.
oauth.browserFailedToOpen: The browser couldn't be opened automatically. Please visit the URL below to complete authentication:
